Title: Between the Devil and the Deep Blue Sea
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Beau DeMayo, Kyle Arrington, Kyle Arrington (story editor), Beau DeMayo (story editor), K.C. Perry (story editor), L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Charles Michael Davis, Yusuf Gatewood
Plot: Frustrated by the lack of progress made in the search for Hayley, Klaus turns up the heat by taking hostages from each of the three New Orleans supernatural factions. Freya goes to Mystic ...
